string-array.name: intro_texts
string-array.item: Saves you the clumsy process of manual log in and verification. one tap is all you need!
Guarantees two-factor authentication, real-time risk prediction, and GDPR compliance
Serves over 900 million users from 190+ countries and regions worldwide and supports 70+ languages.
Supports access from nearly all device types, including phones, tablets, smart screens, head units, and smart wearables.
